content.rendered:
Directed by Shoojit Sircar

Written by Juhi Chaturvedi

Cast Amitabh Bachchan (Mirza Chunnan Nawab). Ayushmann Khurrana (Baankey Rastogi). Vijay Raaz (Gyanesh Shukla). Brijendra Kala (Christopher Clarke). Srishti Shrivastava (Guddo). Farrukh Jaffar (Fatima Begum). Tina Bhatia (Dulahin). Nalneesh Neel (Sheikhu). Poornima Sharma (Fauzia). Jogi Mallang (Munmun Ji). Rehan Kidwai (Neta ji). Ananya Dwivedi (Neetu). Ujali Raj (Payal). Shri Prakash Bajpai (Pandey ji). Behram Rana (Abdul Rehman). Begum Almas Abdullah (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Nawab Jafar Mir Abdullah (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Nawab Masood Abdullah (Shaukat Aapa’s Son). Ali Akbar (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Meraj Alam (Crematorium Caretaker). Alina Ali (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Howeda Ali (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Muniba Ali (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Shireen Khalid Beg (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Prashant Bhagia (Begum’s Paralysed Relative Caretaker Son). Brijmohan (Chappal Shop Owner). Sunil Butolia (Divyansh). Geetika Chakravarti (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Saurabh Dasgupta (Engineers In Unnao). Munazza Faheem (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Gangaram (Begum’s Paralysed Relative). Avinash Gupta (Munmun ji’s Accountant). Nizam Husain (Shaayar At Mushaira (as Nijam Husain)). Abbas Hussian (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Fatima Hussian (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Mahrua Jafar (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Nishat Jafar (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Mehru Jaffer (Shaukat Aapa’s Daughter). Trilochan S. Kalra (Sinha). Deepak Kanojiya (Minister’s Assistant). Kaushik (Tea Seller 1). Ana Ali Khan (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Babar Ali Khan (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Zia Ahmed Khan (Doctor). Mithil Lad (Photographer At College). Azad Mishra (Sayyad). Lajjawati Mishra (Old women). Lajwanti Mishra (Appida). Poonam Mishra (Mishrain). Devendra Modi (Kafan Shop Owner). Nagpal.(Thief 2). Sitwat Ara Naqvi (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Naushad (Puppeteer). Bhargav Oza (Engineers In Unnao). Rajiv Pandey (Police Inspector). Bhavish Patel (Bhavish (credit only)).Abhinav Pundir. Ankur Rastogi (Lawyer assitant). Priyanshu Rathore (Photographer’s Friend). Ali Raza (Sheikhu’s Son). Syed Mohd Rehan (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Tamanna Rehan (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Uzma Rehan (Shaukat Aapa’s Family Member). Adarsh Shukla (Fauzia’s Husband). Archana Shukla (Susheela). Pallavi Singh (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Prisha Singh (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Priyanka Singh (Special Guest at Begum’s Birthday Party). Shubham Singh (Avdesh Gupta). Manish Soni (Guddo’s Frind). Ravish Srivastava (Paster). Abhishek Tiwari (Thief 1). Aditya Tiwari (Antique Shop Owner). Vibhuti Tomar (Gyanesh’s Assistant).Akhilesh Tripathi. Sunil Kumar Verma (Mishra Ji). Sandeep Yadav (Policeman). Uday Vir Singh Yadav (Munna Saxena (as Udayveer Singh Yadav)). Yogesh (Tea Seller 2)

Languages Hindi

Producers Ashutosh Goswami. Sheel Kumar. Ronnie Lahiri

Production Kino Work. Rising Sun Film
